      • canPlaceRoadAtLoc

        public java.lang.Boolean canPlaceRoadAtLoc(TurnManager turnManager,
                                  EdgeLocation location,
                                  User user)
        Checks to see whether the location is valid for road placement - i.e. is it adjacent to other roads or buidlings owned by the user, is the location unoccupied, etc.
        Parameters:
        turnManager - -- if it is user's turn and if model is at 'Playing'
        location - -- where the road will be placed
        user - -- the user desiring to place the road
        Returns:
        true if the user can place the road at the given location, false otherwise
